alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Marathon; Shawano (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 9:25PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Marathon, southwestern Langlade and western Shawano Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 925 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Antigo, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Antigo, Birnamwood, Mattoon, Aniwa, Eland, Elmhurst, Hogarty and Phlox. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central, north central and northeastern Wisconsin.
